name: api_physics_FixedJoint
description: The Fixed joint groups together 2 rigidbodies, making them stick together in their bound position.

properties.name: gameObject
properties.description: The game object this component is attached to. A component is always attached to a game object.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: The tag of this game object.

properties.name: transform
properties.description: The Transform attached to this GameObject.

properties.name: transformHandle
properties.description: The TransformHandle of this GameObject.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: The Position of the anchor around which the joints motion is constrained.

properties.name: autoConfigureConnectedAnchor
properties.description: Should the connectedAnchor be calculated automatically?

properties.name: axis
properties.description: The Direction of the axis around which the body is constrained.

properties.name: breakForce
properties.description: The force that needs to be applied for this joint to break.

properties.name: breakTorque
properties.description: The torque that needs to be applied for this joint to break. To be able to break, a joint must be _Locked_ or _Limited_ on the axis of rotation where the torque is being applied. This means that some joints cannot break, such as an unconstrained Configurable Joint.

properties.name: connectedAnchor
properties.description: Position of the anchor relative to the connected Rigidbody.

properties.name: connectedArticulationBody
properties.description: A reference to an articulation body this joint connects to.

properties.name: connectedBody
properties.description: A reference to another rigidbody this joint connects to.

properties.name: connectedMassScale
properties.description: The scale to apply to the inverse mass and inertia tensor of the connected body prior to solving the constraints.

properties.name: currentForce
properties.description: The force applied by the solver to satisfy all constraints.

properties.name: currentTorque
properties.description: The torque applied by the solver to satisfy all constraints.

properties.name: enableCollision
properties.description: Enable collision between bodies connected with the joint.

properties.name: enablePreprocessing
properties.description: Toggle preprocessing for this joint.

properties.name: massScale
properties.description: The scale to apply to the inverse mass and inertia tensor of the body prior to solving the constraints.

properties.name: hideFlags
properties.description: Should the object be hidden, saved with the Scene or modifiable by the user?

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the object.
